remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型类是与 O 二进制搜索树 (日志`n`) 检索，其中`n`是字典中的元素数。The generic class is a binary search tree with O(log `n`) retrieval, where `n` is the number of elements in the dictionary. 在这一方面，它是类似于泛型类。In this respect, it is similar to the generic class. 两个类具有类似的对象模型，并且都具有 O (日志`n`) 检索。The two classes have similar object models, and both have O(log `n`) retrieval. 两个类的不同之处是在内存使用和的插入和删除的速度：Where the two classes differ is in memory use and speed of insertion and removal: - 使用较少的内存比。 uses less memory than . - 更快的插入和删除操作的未排序的数据： O (日志`n`) 而不是 O (`n`) 为。 has faster insertion and removal operations for unsorted data: O(log `n`) as opposed to O(`n`) for . - 如果从已排序的数据，在一次填充列表比快。If the list is populated all at once from sorted data, is faster than . 可以将每个键/值对的形式进行检索结构，或被通过非泛型接口。Each key/value pair can be retrieved as a structure, or as a through the nongeneric interface. 密钥必须是不可变，只要它们是否用作中的键。Keys must be immutable as long as they are used as keys in the . 中的所有键必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 密钥不能为`null`，但值则可以为，如果类型值`TValue`是引用类型。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be, if the value type `TValue` is a reference type. 需要一个比较器实现，以执行键的比较。 requires a comparer implementation to perform key comparisons. 你可以指定的实现使用接受一个构造函数的泛型接口`comparer`参数; 如果未指定实现，默认 genericcomparer使用。You can specify an implementation of the generic interface by using a constructor that accepts a `comparer` parameter; if you do not specify an implementation, the default genericcomparer is used. 如果类型`TKey`实现泛型接口，则默认比较器使用该实现。If type `TKey` implements the generic interface, the default comparer uses that implementation. `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`for each` c + + 中`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 返回集合中的元素的类型的对象。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) returns an object of the type of the elements in the collection. 由于每个元素的是一个键/值对，元素类型不是键的类型或值的类型。Since each element of the is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反，元素类型是。Instead, the element type is . 下面的代码演示 C#、 c + + 和 Visual Basic 语法。The following code shows C#, C++, and Visual Basic syntax. remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举而言，对于每个项都是结构，它表示一个值和其密钥。For purposes of enumeration, each item is a structure representing a value and its key. `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`for each` c + + 中`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 字典将保留在使用内部树的排序顺序。The dictionary is maintained in a sorted order using an internal tree. 每个新元素都位于正确的排序位置，并对树进行调整以维护排序顺序，只要移除元素。Every new element is positioned at the correct sort position, and the tree is adjusted to maintain the sort order whenever an element is removed. 枚举，时维护排序顺序。While enumerating, the sort order is maintained. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置上，属性是不确定。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，必须调用方法将枚举数前移到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 属性返回之前的相同元素调用方法。The property returns the same element until the method is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 此方法为 O (日志 n) 运算，其中 n 是计数。This method is an O(log n) operation, where n is count.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这可能会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which can cause the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 属性返回可以用于对访问进行同步的对象。The property returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the . 同步是仅当所有线程在访问该集合之前都锁定的对象时，才有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock the object before accessing the collection. 获取此属性的值是一个 o （1） 操作。Getting the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举而言，对于每个项都是结构，它表示一个值和其密钥。For purposes of enumeration, each item is a structure representing a value and its key. `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`for each` c + + 中`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 方法还会枚举器放回此位置。The method also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，属性是不确定。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，必须调用方法将枚举数前移到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 属性返回相同的对象之前或调用。The property returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过使用枚举字典中的键/值对`foreach`语句 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中， `for each` c + + 中)，从而隐藏的枚举器使用。The following code example shows how to enumerate the key/value pairs in the dictionary by using the `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in C++), which hides the use of the enumerator. 具体而言，请注意，枚举数接口返回对象而非对象。In particular, note that the enumerator for the interface returns objects rather than objects. 此代码示例摘自的更大的示例，包括输出，为提供方法。The code example is part of a larger example, including output, provided for the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合在创建之后不能再添加或移除元素，但是允许修改现有元素。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合是只是一个集合的包装器防止添加和移除元素;因此，如果对基础集合，包括添加或移除元素，进行更改的固定大小的集合将反映这些更改。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 获取此属性的值是一个 o （1） 操作。Getting the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供能够通过使用下面的 C# 语法来访问集合中的特定元素： `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)`在 Visual Basic 中)。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following C# syntax: `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)` in Visual Basic). 你还可以使用属性不存在的键的值设置字典; 中添加新元素，例如， `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 但是，如果在字典中已存在指定的键，则将设置属性将会覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反，方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. C# 语言使用[这](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md)关键字来定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the [this](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 获取此属性的值是 O (日志`n`) 操作; 将属性设置也是 O (日志`n`) 操作。Getting the value of this property is an O(log `n`) operation; setting the property is also an O(log `n`) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性 （C# 中的索引器） 的与，以及方法属性不同于属性。The following code example shows how to use the property (the indexer in C#) of the interface with a , and ways the property differs from the property. 该示例演示，如属性，属性可以更改与现有密钥关联的值，用于添加新键/值对，如果指定的键不在字典中。The example shows that, like the property, the property can change the value associated with an existing key and can be used to add a new key/value pair if the specified key is not in the dictionary. 该示例还显示与属性，属性不会引发异常，如果`key`未在字典中，返回空引用相反。The example also shows that unlike the property, the property does not throw an exception if `key` is not in the dictionary, returning a null reference instead. 最后，该示例演示了如何该获取属性将返回空引用，如果`key`不正确的数据类型，并在设置属性引发异常，如果`key`不正确的数据类型。Finally, the example demonstrates that getting the property returns a null reference if `key` is not the correct data type, and that setting the property throws an exception if `key` is not the correct data type. 此代码示例摘自的更大的示例，包括输出，为提供方法。The code example is part of a larger example, including output, provided for the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将功能组合方法和属性。This method combines the functionality of the method and the property. 如果未找到项，则`value`参数为值类型获取适当的默认值`TValue`; 例如，0 （零） 为整数类型`false`为布尔值类型和`null`对于引用类型。If the key is not found, then the `value` parameter gets the appropriate default value for the value type `TValue`; for example, 0 (zero) for integer types, `false` for Boolean types, and `null` for reference types. 此方法为 O (日志`n`) 操作。This method is an O(log `n`) operation. ## Examples 该示例演示如何使用方法作为更高效的方法来检索频繁尝试不在字典中的键的程序中的值。The example shows how to use the method as a more efficient way to retrieve values in a program that frequently tries keys that are not in the dictionary. 有关与之相反，该示例还演示如何属性 （C# 中的索引器） 在尝试检索不存在的键时引发异常。For contrast, the example also shows how the property (the indexer in C#) throws exceptions when attempting to retrieve nonexistent keys. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的值根据排序属性，并在中的关联键顺序相同返回属性。The values in the are sorted according to the property, and are in the same order as the associated keys in the returned by the property. 返回不是静态的副本; 相反，引用回原来的值。The returned is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the values in the original . 因此，更改为继续才会反映在。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the . 获取此属性的值是一个 o （1） 操作。Getting the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 此代码示例演示如何枚举的值在字典中使用属性，以及如何枚举的键和值字典中的。This code example shows how to enumerate the values in the dictionary using the property, and how to enumerate the keys and values in the dictionary. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
